caller_intent: The caller wants to pay their car insurance premium immediately using a debit card and set up auto-pay for future payments once they have their banking details.
resolution_steps: Confirmed the caller's Progressive policy and payment amount ($286.15).
Processed a one-time debit card payment using the provided card number (4224...2548) and expiration date (Feb 2028).
Offered to email a payment confirmation receipt.
Clarified that the debit card information would not be saved for auto-pay setup.
Informed the caller they would need to contact the agency again next week to establish auto-pay with their checking account details.
knowledge_required: Data security protocols for handling card information
summary: A Progressive policyholder made a one-time car insurance payment via debit card and scheduled a follow-up to set up auto-pay. The agent processed the payment, sent a confirmation email, and explained that auto-pay requires a separate banking information setup.
